Relationship Configuration¶

This section describes the relationship() function and in depth discussion of its usage. For an introduction to relationships, start with the 객체 관계형 튜토리얼(Object Relational Tutorial) and head into 릴레이션 만들기(Building a Relationship).

    • One To Many
    • Many To One
    • One To One
    • Many To Many
    • Association Object
  • Adjacency List Relationships

  • Linking Relationships with Backref

  • Configuring how Relationship Joins
    • Handling Multiple Join Paths
    • Specifying Alternate Join Conditions
    • Creating Custom Foreign Conditions

    • Overlapping Foreign Keys
    • Non-relational Comparisons / Materialized Path
    • Self-Referential Many-to-Many Relationship
    • Composite "Secondary" Joins
    • Relationship to Aliased Class
    • Row-Limited Relationships with Window Functions
    • Building Query-Enabled Properties
  • Collection Configuration and Techniques
    • Working with Large Collections
    • Customizing Collection Access
    • Custom Collection Implementations
    • Collection Internals
  • Special Relationship Persistence Patterns
    • Rows that point to themselves / Mutually Dependent Rows
    • Mutable Primary Keys / Update Cascades
  • Relationships API
